meaningMnemonic: <radical>Boot</radical>s give you the <radical>power</radical> to <kanji>work</kanji>! That's why so many professions require you to have work boots.
readingMnemonic: You need boots to give you the power to <kanji>work</kanji> for the <reading>Kin</reading>g (きん) of England. Really, all work is for the King, since everything is for him. But even he wears boots. And they give him the power to uh... king over things.
